author: Erin Doherty
title: UN: More than 150,000 Ukrainian refugees have fled the country
description: At least 100,000 refugees are displaced internally in Ukraine and "the numbers are most likely much higher."
content:
More than 150,000 refugees have fled Ukraine into neighboring countries since Russia launched its unprovoked invasion of Ukraine.
